name: Hyperiums-greasemonkey
body:
### Greasemonkey extensions for hyperiums

All the following scripts need the firefox greasemonkey extension. They runs also on safari with ninjakit.

### Map
![ScreenShot](https://raw.github.com/Nasga/hyperiums-greasemonkey/master/map-trading.png)

[Install this script](https://raw.github.com/Nasga/hyperiums-greasemonkey/master/map-trading.user.js)
